birth_place.zh-cn: 美国密苏里州堪萨斯城

description.zh-cn: 美国记者，因其在中国革命期间的著作而闻名。他被认为是第一个采访中共领导人毛泽东的西方记者，其著作《红星照耀中国》（又名《西行漫记》）记录了中国共产主义运动。他被中方视为“中国人民的老朋友”。
description.en: American journalist known for his books and articles on Communism in China and the Chinese Communist revolution. He is best known for his book, Red Star Over China, an account of the Chinese Communist movement. He is considered one of the 'old friends of the Chinese people'.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的主要缔造者和领导人。
description.en: The main founder and leader of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 由埃德加·斯诺撰写的纪实作品，记录了从中国共产党创建至1930年代期间的中国共产主义运动。
description.en: A book by Edgar Snow, it is an account of the Chinese Communist movement from its foundation until the late 1930s.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 美国记者，埃德加·斯诺的第一任妻子。
description.en: American journalist, first wife of Edgar Snow.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治家和社会活动家，中华人民共和国的缔造者之一。
description.en: Chinese politician and social activist, one of the founders of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在抗日战争时期建立的革命根据地。
description.en: A revolutionary base area established by the Communist Party of China during the Second Sino-Japanese War.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国元帅，中国人民解放军的创始人和领导人之一。
description.en: Marshal of the People's Republic of China, one of the founders and leaders of the People's Liberation Army.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军大将。
description.en: A General of the People's Liberation Army of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国工农红军和八路军高级将领。
description.en: A senior general of the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army and the Eighth Route Army.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国元帅。
description.en: A Marshal of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国工农红军及中国人民解放军高级将领。
description.en: A senior general of the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army and the People's Liberation Army.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治家、外交家、金融家。
description.en: A politician, diplomat, and financier of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治家、外交家、社会活动家。
description.en: A politician, diplomat, and social activist of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 美国演员，埃德加·斯诺的第二任妻子。晚年曾谴责中国的人权问题。
description.en: American actress, the second wife of Edgar Snow. In her later years, she condemned human rights issues in China.

description.zh-cn: 美国第37任总统。
description.en: The 37th President of the United States.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国第二代中央领导集体的核心。
description.en: The core of the second generation of central leadership of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 曾任中华人民共和国国务院总理。
description.en: Former Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 美国记者、作家和社会活动家，以报道和支持共产主义运动而闻名，与斯诺、史沫特莱并称“3S”。
description.en: American journalist, writer, and social activist, known for her reporting on and support for communist movements. Grouped with Snow and Smedley as the '3S'.

description.zh-cn: 美国记者、作家和社会活动家，以报道中国革命而闻名，与斯诺、斯特朗并称“3S”。
description.en: American journalist, writer, and social activist, known for her reporting on the Chinese Revolution. Grouped with Snow and Strong as the '3S'.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国邮电部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国邮电部
en: Ministry of Posts and Telecommunications of the People's Republic of China

position.zh-cn: 驻远东游历记者、驻北平代表
position.en: Roving Correspondent in the Far East, Peking Representative
Lecturer in the Department of Journalism

description.zh-cn: 经宋庆龄介绍，斯诺访问了陕甘宁边区。
description.en: Through Soong Ching-ling's introduction, Snow visited the Shaan-Gan-Ning Border Region.

description.zh-cn: 斯诺是第一位采访毛泽东的西方记者，并于1936年6月至10月期间在陕甘宁边区进行了深入采访。他最后一次会见毛泽东是在1970年12月18日。
description.en: Snow was the first Western journalist to interview Mao Zedong, conducting extensive interviews in the Shaan-Gan-Ning Border Region between June and October 1936. His last meeting with Mao was on December 18, 1970.

description.zh-cn: 1936年访问陕甘宁边区期间采访了彭德怀。
description.en: Interviewed Peng Dehuai during his visit to the Shaan-Gan-Ning Border Region in 1936.

description.zh-cn: 1936年访问陕甘宁边区期间采访了徐海东。
description.en: Interviewed Xu Haidong during his visit to the Shaan-Gan-Ning Border Region in 1936.

description.zh-cn: 1936年访问陕甘宁边区期间采访了左权。
description.en: Interviewed Zuo Quan during his visit to the Shaan-Gan-Ning Border Region in 1936.

description.zh-cn: 1936年访问陕甘宁边区期间采访了聂荣臻。
description.en: Interviewed Nie Rongzhen during his visit to the Shaan-Gan-Ning Border Region in 1936.

description.zh-cn: 1936年访问陕甘宁边区期间采访了程子华。
description.en: Interviewed Cheng Zihua during his visit to the Shaan-Gan-Ning Border Region in 1936.

description.zh-cn: 斯诺在北京写成了《红星照耀中国》（又名《西行漫记》）。
description.en: Snow wrote 'Red Star Over China' in Beijing.

description.zh-cn: 斯诺向宋庆龄介绍了中国工合运动的计划，并说服宋子文为其提供贷款，促进了工合运动的发展。
description.en: Snow introduced the plan for the Chinese Industrial Cooperatives movement to Soong Ching-ling, persuaded T.V. Soong to provide loans, and promoted the development of the movement.

description.zh-cn: 在皖南事变中，国民党军队突袭了新四军。
description.en: During the New Fourth Army Incident, Kuomintang forces ambushed the New Fourth Army.

description.zh-cn: 时任新四军驻香港办事处主任的廖承志与宋庆龄一同将皖南事变的消息告知斯诺。
description.en: Liao Chengzhi, then head of the New Fourth Army's Hong Kong office, along with Soong Ching-ling, informed Snow about the New Fourth Army Incident.

description.zh-cn: 因报道皖南事变，国民党重庆政府取缔了斯诺的记者采访权，迫使其离开中国。
description.en: Due to his reporting on the New Fourth Army Incident, the Kuomintang government in Chongqing revoked Snow's press credentials, forcing him to leave China.

description.zh-cn: 在麦卡锡主义时期，联邦调查局因斯诺与共产党的关系而对其进行质询。
description.en: During the McCarthy era, the FBI questioned Snow about his relationship with the communists.

description.zh-cn: 斯诺在1970年访华期间，被告知中国欢迎美国总统尼克松访华，他随后将此信息传递给了美国。
description.en: During his visit to China in 1970, Snow was told that US President Nixon would be welcome to visit, a message he subsequently relayed to the United States.

description.zh-cn: 埃德加·斯诺因胰腺癌病逝。
description.en: Edgar Snow died of pancreatic cancer.

description.zh-cn: 洛伊斯·惠勒·斯诺谴责中国政府在1989年暴力镇压天安门抗议者。
description.en: Lois Wheeler Snow condemned the Chinese government for its violent suppression of the Tiananmen Square protesters in 1989.

description.zh-cn: 洛伊斯·惠勒·斯诺曾写信给邓小平，呼吁关注受六四事件影响的家庭。
description.en: Lois Wheeler Snow wrote a letter to Deng Xiaoping, calling for attention to the families affected by the Tiananmen Square incident.

description.zh-cn: 洛伊斯·惠勒·斯诺曾写信给朱镕基，呼吁关注受六四事件影响的家庭。
description.en: Lois Wheeler Snow wrote a letter to Zhu Rongji, calling for attention to the families affected by the Tiananmen Square incident.

description.zh-cn: 斯诺与安娜·路易丝·斯特朗、艾格尼丝·史沫特莱被并称为“3S”，均是报道中国革命的著名美国记者。
description.en: Snow, along with Anna Louise Strong and Agnes Smedley, were known as the '3S', all famous American journalists who reported on the Chinese revolution.

description.zh-cn: 斯诺与安娜·路易丝·斯特朗、艾格尼丝·史沫特莱被并称为“3S”，均是报道中国革命的著名美国记者。
description.en: Snow, along with Anna Louise Strong and Agnes Smedley, were known as the '3S', all famous American journalists who reported on the Chinese revolution.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国邮电部

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国邮电部发行了一套《中国人民之友》纪念邮票，其中一枚上的人物是埃德加·斯诺，以纪念其贡献。
description.en: The Ministry of Posts and Telecommunications of the PRC issued a set of commemorative stamps titled 'Friends of the Chinese People', one of which featured Edgar Snow to commemorate his contributions.

description.zh-cn: 埃德加·斯诺被描述为亲中共的美国记者，并通过其著作向西方世界介绍了中国共产党。
description.en: Edgar Snow was described as a pro-CPC American journalist and introduced the Communist Party of China to the Western world through his writings.
